resources.string: Not connected to google api client
No network connection. Please connect and try again.
Sorry, you have not yet reached the correct location. If you need a hint, please click the hint button below.
Sorry, you have not yet reached the correct location.
You already completed this quest! Please press the back button to select a new quest.
No hint available for this clue
No geofences were retrieved from the server. Please make sure you are connected to a network and try again.
No quests were retrieved from the server. Please make sure you are connected to a network and try again.
Please select a quest to view its description or to begin the quest
Unable to retrieve events. Please check your network and try again.
Are you sure you want to go back to the quest selection screen? Your current quest will not be saved.
We do not currently have a location. Please try again soon
No nearby memories. Please try again soon
Please add the name of the memory uploader
Please add a description for the memory you are uploading
Unable to get your location. Please try again soon.
Unable to retrieve info about geofences. Please check your internet connection and try again.
We were unable to add your memory at this time. Please try again later.

"You are on a quest! If you think you've reached the location the clue is referring to, click the "Am I There?" button and the GPS on your phone will let you know if you've reached the correct location and give you the next clue! If you’re stuck, click on "HINT" to help you out!"

"Explore Carleton’s history! Markers represent points of interest on the Carleton campus. Tap on a marker to view more information about the point. \nTo see stories and images others have uploaded about Carleton or to upload your own, tap on “Read and Share Carleton Stories”."

"Ready for a Carleton adventure? Embark on a quest using the clues provided! After figuring out what location on campus each clue refers to, walk to that location. When you think you've found the correct location, tap "Am I There?" to recieve the next clue. If you’re stuck, use the Hints provided to help you out!"
You already started this quest. Would you like to resume it or start over?"
Your GPS seems to be disabled, do you want to enable it?
"Walk to the correct location and click "Am I There?""
The Quests feature is intended to be used on the Carleton College campus. Visit campus soon to embark on a Quest!
"It looks like you're off campus! Return to campus soon to finish your quest."
This feature requires GPS to be used. Would you like to turn it on?
There are currently no events listed. Please try again soon.
